original_text: Nebuchadnezzar wanted young men who were strong and handsome. They must be clever so that they could learn and understand things quickly. They must be good enough to become King Nebuchadnezzar's servants. They would learn the language of Babylon, and they would read its books.
korean_text: 곧 흠이 없고 용모가 아름다우며 모든 지혜를 통찰하며 지식에 통달하며 학문에 익숙하여 왕궁에 설 만한 소년을 데려오게 하였고 그들에게 갈대아 사람의 학문과 언어를 가르치게 하였고

sentences.original_text: so that they could learn and understand things quickly
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 빨리 배우고 이해할 수 있었다

sentences.original_text: They would learn the language of Babylon
and they would read its books
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그 책들을 읽을 것이었다
